description: Face the cold weather with confidence and style in our flagship creation, the Ayaba quilted parka. Its insulation, a luxurious blend of down and feathers, ensures exceptional warmth even in temperatures as low as -30°C. The waterproof nylon shell offers both breathability and wind resistance, shielding you from icy winter gusts. Inner cuffs provide added warmth for your hands, while the adjustable hood and two-way zipper offer unparalleled flexibility. The Ayaba parka is more than just a garment. It's your ultimate shield against the winter cold.
name: Ayaba II Jacket - Womens

specs.value: White duck down, 80% down 20% feather - fill power of 700 in³
